title: Offers Accepted: t206 4 back miscut PSA 2(mc) / 2 back miscut PSA 3(mc)
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: Offers Accepted: t206 4 back miscut PSA 2(mc) / 2 back miscut PSA 3(mc)
posts.post_content:
Admittedly the 3rd and 4th backs are very slight, but they are there.  I am accepting offers on this Bob Groom card: $500 or best offer

[IMG]http://www.whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/558dea7a1e17aa97/max_size/54373657f0012_rear.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/558dea7a1e17aa97/large/54373657f0012_front.jpg[/IMG]



Also I will entertain offers on this PSA 3(mc) Happy Smith 2 back miscut: $100 or best offer

[IMG]http://www.whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/6a75ad53dcee066b/max_size/543738360ab59_rear.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.whitewhalecards.com/files/card_images/user_cards/6a75ad53dcee066b/large/543738360ab59_front.jpg[/IMG]

If you missed out on the 4 miscuts in REA for $1400 or want to add to your newly aquired grouping you can still make me an offer on these two :D

[url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=32233[/url]

As the consignor of the 4 card REA lot, I can tell you they went for a song, I had a lot more into them...So the cards offered here are very reasonably priced.

Good luck with the sale.

PS- I used to own this Groom as well. :)
